line.originaltext: 2/3 cup butter, softened
1/4 cup white sugar
1 1/4 cups all-purpose flour
1/2 cup butter
1/2 cup packed light brown sugar
2 tablespoons light corn syrup
1/2 cup sweetened condensed milk
1 1/4 cups milk chocolate chips
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 C).
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 C).
In a medium bowl, mix together 2/3 cup butter, 1/4 cup white sugar, and 1 1/4 cup flour until evenly crumbly.
In a medium bowl, mix together 2/3 cup butter, 1/4 cup white sugar, and 1 1/4 cup flour until evenly crumbly.
In a medium bowl, mix together 2/3 cup butter, 1/4 cup white sugar, and 1 1/4 cup flour until evenly crumbly.
In a medium bowl, mix together 2/3 cup butter, 1/4 cup white sugar, and 1 1/4 cup flour until evenly crumbly.
line.annotation: mix(ing8, t1, ing9, "crumbly dough", "mix until evenly crumbly")

line.originaltext: Press into 9" square baking pan.
Press into 9" square baking pan.
Bake for 20 minutes.
line.annotation: cook(ing9, t0, ing10, "baked dough", "bake for 20 minutes")

line.originaltext: In a 2 quart saucepan, combine 1/2 cup butter, brown sugar, corn syrup, and sweetened condensed milk.
In a 2 quart saucepan, combine 1/2 cup butter, brown sugar, corn syrup, and sweetened condensed milk.
line.annotation: combine({ing3, ing4, ing5, ing6}, ing11, "sweet mix", "")

line.originaltext: Bring to a boil.
line.annotation: cook(ing11, t3, ing12, "boiled mix", "bring to a boil")

line.originaltext: Continue to boil for 5 minutes.
line.annotation: cook(ing12, t3, ing13, "boiled mix", "continue to boil for 5 minutes")

line.originaltext: Remove from heat and beat vigorously with a wooden spoon for about 3 minutes.
Remove from heat and beat vigorously with a wooden spoon for about 3 minutes.
Pour over baked crust (warm or cool).
line.annotation: combine({ing10, ing14}, ing15, "pie thing", "pour over baked crust")

line.originaltext: Cool until it begins to firm.
Cool until it begins to firm.
Melt chocolate and pour over caramel layer.
Melt chocolate and pour over caramel layer.
line.annotation: combine({ing15, ing16}, ing17, "chocolate thing", "pour over caramel layer")

line.originaltext: Cover the layer completely.
line.annotation: mix(ing17, t2, ing18, "caramel square", "cover the layer completely")

line.originaltext: Chill.
Cut into squares (about 48 - small because it is rich).
line.annotation: cut(ing18, , ing19, "caramel squares", "cut into about 48 small squares")

line.originaltext: Cut into squares (about 48 - small because it is rich).
